BBEX3.A.GHS.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Ghana / EUR 1 = GHS ... (buying)

General: With effect from 1 July 2007, a currency conversion took place at the rate of 10,000 cedi (GHC) = 1 Ghana cedi (GHS). The currency conversion did not entail any appreciation or depreciation against other currencies.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 2007: With effect from 1 July 2007, a currency conversion took place at the rate of 10,000 cedi (GHC) = 1 Ghana cedi (GHS); the exchange rates calculated between January and June 2007 were included in the calculation at the rate of GHC 10,000 = GHS 1.
